abstract: A Louisiana microchain finds its way to the Big Apple.
snippet: A Louisiana microchain finds its way to the Big Apple.
lead_paragraph: It's hard not to feel naughty when ordering a 10-inch pizza for lunch. Sure, it's got three food groups on there (and up to four or five, if you include certain toppings), but that crust is awfully thick, there's got to be added sugar in that red sauce, and ugh - can someone pass the napkins? This Day-Glo orange grease is dripping everywhere.

headline.main: Naked Pizza Is New to Town
